msg: by doing select() for the non-perlio case finally made this test working

author: stas
msg: - IoIFP(io) *must* be always set on the valid io sv, otherwise it'll be
never closed and fh and memory leaked. as i saw from doio.c, the solution
- add IoTYPE_WRONLY and IoTYPE_RDONLY flags to protect from wrong use

author: stas
msg: - try to go without the dup() in the non-perlio case, leave enough
comments to easily reconstruct the dupping code correctly if that proves
